title: Competing To Be Herself
description:
Miss Utah USA Rachel Slawson has competed in her share of beauty pageants, but it took a long time for her to compete in them on her own terms — and this year, she made history.

Follow Rachel Slawson on Instagram, Twitter, and online

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
